titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2419) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006, and for other purposes purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-94, by Mr. Diaz-Balart, L..
All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived. Points of order against provisions in the bill for failure to comply with clause 2 of rule XXI are waived except for section 104.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 42.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 291.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 190 (Roll no. 203).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/24/2005--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2419) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006, and for other purposes.
